title: Figure of a Kneeling Man
description:
Small bronze of a kneeling man with hands resting on knees. Kilt only clothing. Large dowel on base. Probably from a small bronze composition. 

Condition: Poor. Entire surface rubbed and worn. Features of face almost obliterated. Considerable encrustation on front of body which should be removed.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
